metadata.title: CVE-2020-6582 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow, as demonstrated byinterpretation of a small negative number as a large positive number duringa bzero call.

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
